Package model.heroState

Class Hero

java.lang.Object
model.GameObject
model.DynamicObject
model.heroState.Hero
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject
public class Hero extends DynamicObject implements Subject
A Hero is a DynamicObject that is controllable by the player. Hero can shoot HeroProjectiles, shield from attacks, press w for a special attack and collect Fruits for points, press for dash.
